# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.AVX property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Advanced Vector Extensions. A value of true indicates the processor supports the AVX instruction extensions.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: AVX
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey AVX { get; }
```
